TopicTitle: How much dV is required to get from Minmus to the Mun?

Articles.Content:
I'm playing Career mode for the first time, and would rather not have to send another rocket to do some Mun stuff. My Minmus lander has 2km/s dV in it, and is sitting in a 50km circular orbit.

If at all possible, I'd like to land while I'm at it.

EDIT: Transferred from Minmus to the Mun, I now have 1.6km/s dV. I am in a 20km circular orbit. Is it landable?

Edited January 31, 2015 by leopardenthusiast

2km/s could work. You will need about 250 m/s to get a circular orbit around the MÃƒÂ¼n and about 700 to get down and another 700 to get back up. So, you have to do the transfer with around 300 - 400 m/s from Minmus to MÃƒÂ¼n... Can be done. But your guys need to hitch a ride home, so better send either a refueler or a return craft into mÃƒÂ¼nar orbit first.

That I can definitely do. Thanks!

1.6 in munar orbit should be enough to land, reorbit, and get home again.

Good luck!

Edited January 31, 2015 by Starhawk
correction

1.6 in munar orbit should be lots to land, reorbit, and get home again.

Good luck!

Thanks! I successfully landed, did my flag planting, took all the science I had equipment for (not much - I get most of my science from contracts), and am now timewarping to my second aerobraking pass.
